channel.title: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?
channel.description: Any1 no of a server source that is good for pking and can hold 100 ppl? if u no plz tell me thanx :D [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3.0.html]Rule 3[/url][/center]

item.title: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Well, having a crappy server to run on a “ok” as you could say, will lagg with alot on. A nice clean, stable source on even a crappy computer can run with really not using alot of ram an memory.

Read full topic
item.source: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?

item.title: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

It isn’t hard to get rid of the lag. Just clean up your server files.

Read full topic
item.source: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?

item.title: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @W_W_E W W E
item.description:
@W_W_E wrote:

really objects in your server dont create a big “lag” it depends on your connection type…i have like 20 world objects with a timer on them and i have no lag

Read full topic
item.source: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?

item.title: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @Snark Snark
item.description:
@Snark wrote:

I’ve only gotten around 80 players online at once with my old server… since then i’ve gotten a better internet connection and a better computer overall. I believe it actually just depends on what you in your server, make sure there isn’t too many world objects, I know that creates lag and don’t have all of your players CLICKING.

Read full topic
item.source: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?

item.title: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

Meh, I lag HORRIBLY when 100+ people are on, but others don’t. Guess thats what i get for hosting :(.

Read full topic
item.source: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?

item.title: Is dere a server that can hold as much as 100 ppl?
item.dc:creator: @W_W_E W W E
item.description:
@W_W_E wrote:

even with a fast internet speed like 100mps, or 2g ram your server would lag a good amount, so i wouldnt suggest letting your server hold more than like 50ppl

Read full topic
